member.name: T:std.basic_string`3
member.summary: A string is a container that provides functionality for manipulating sequences of characters. Operations such as comparison, concatenation, copying, and assignment are available.
member.typeparam: The data type of a single character to be stored in the string.
Character traits for the template character type. Defaults to std::char_traits for the specified template character type.

The type that represents the stored allocator object that encapsulates details about the string's allocation and deallocation of memory. Defaults to std::allocator for the specified template character type.
